description.ko: 프랙탈 자연이 산업 기술을 되찾는 디지털 정원의 예술적 표현입니다.
description.en: An artistic representation of a digital garden where fractal nature reclaims industrial technology.

prompt: A majestic digital weeping willow with branches made of translucent #89CFF0 glass fibers, growing from a base of oxidized copper microchips. The leaves are intricate fractal flowers in #FFB6C1 and #4A0E4E that bloom with soft light. Nature reclaiming technology through mossy circuitry and binary-coded petals. 8k, macro photography style, Octane Render. Intricate subsurface scattering on the glass foliage, cinematic lighting, and a soft bokeh background emphasizing the delicate intersection of organic life and silicon.
